grains.name: Soy
grains.effect: Used as a hypoallergenic source of protein & carbs
grains.details: Cats can develop allergies to it later in life

grains.name: Corn
grains.effect: Used as a source of carbs & fiber
grains.details: Metabolizes into sugar in the gut

grains.name: Wheat
grains.effect: Used as a source of carbs
grains.details: Common allergen for both dogs & cats

additives.name: Tocopherols (mixed or non-mixed)
additives.effect: A food preservative used to add Vitamin E to products
additives.details: Your pet may be allergic since its derived sources (veggies, nuts or fish) are not listed on the label

additives.name: L-ascorbyl-2-polyphosphate
additives.details: There have been no controversies thus far.

additives.name: Menadione sodium bisulfate comple
additives.details: A known carcinogenic & also technically illegal since AAFCO only allows it to be used in Poultry feed

preservatives.name: Butylated Hydroxyanisole (BHA)
preservatives.details: Labelled as a carcinogen in California & banned in the EU

preservatives.name: Butylated Hydroxytoluene (BHT)
preservatives.details: Not concluded to be a carcinogen but still banned in Japan, Romania, Sweden & Australia

preservatives.name: Ethoxyquin
preservatives.details: Not concluded to be a carcinogen but still banned in the EU & Australia

proteins.name: Meat
proteins.effect: Clean muscle (skeletal, tongue, diaphragm, heart, esophagus) from animals
proteins.details: May or may not include fat, skin, nerves, & blood vessels

proteins.name: Meat meal
proteins.effect: Rendered (or processed) product from animal tissues
proteins.details: Excludes hair, hooves, horn, hide, manure, or GI contents

proteins.name: Meat and bone meal
proteins.effect: Rendered (or processed) product from animal tissues & bones
proteins.details: Excludes hair, hooves, horn, hide, manure, or GI contents

proteins.name: Meat by-product
proteins.effect: Rendered (or processed) product from animal tissues & bones
proteins.details: Excludes hair, hooves, horn, hide, manure, or GI contents

proteins.name: Meat digest
proteins.effect: Materials resulting from chemical or enzymatic degradation of clean animal tissue
proteins.details: Excludes hair, horns, teeth, hooves, & feathers

ingredients.name: Poultry
ingredients.details: This is 25-95% poultry. Ingredients named afterwards make up at least 3% each.

ingredients.name: Poultry
ingredients.details: This is 0% actual poultry. There may be stock or some other substitute used.

ingredients.details: This is 25-95% beef/deer. Ingredients named afterwards make up at least 3% each.

ingredients.details: This is 0% actual beef/deer. There may be stock or some other substitute used.
